incorrect.text: Carlos accepts the money from Rafael and services the improperly installed devices. Johnson Controls keeps the building contracts.

correct.text: Carlos calls his manager for advice.
Carlos’ manager instructs him to leave with his team. When Carlos is back at the office, they place a call to the Compliance department together.

An investigation is launched, and it’s found that Rafael has made this offer several times in the past – and other Johnson Controls technicians have accepted the bribe. The company takes disciplinary action against these technicians.
